H0.text: Bases are substances that do not react with metal, a property that distinguishes them from acids.

H2.text: Minerals are substances that do not react with metal, a property that distinguishes them from acids.

H3.text: Protiens are the substances that do not react with metal, which distinguishes them from acids.
